dmca.title: SilverSource Copyright Infringement Complaint Against Jewelry Website
dmca.body:
SilverSource.com
	
February 7, 2005 
Google, Inc.
Attn: User Support, DMCA Complaints
[Private]
Mountain View, CA 94043
NOTICE OF INFRINGEMENT
We are writing to make you aware of theft of our copyrighted site materials, and to request that you remove or disable access to these stolen materials in compliance with the Digital Milennium Copyright Act.

The copyrighted work at issue is the text which appears via
Search Query: "Silver Source Wholesale Jewelry"
Infringing Web Pages: http://www.bapnasilver.com/about.asp http://www.prweb.com/releases/2004/11/prwebl73592.htm http://www.alibaba.com/company/10219940.html

Our original copyrighted text can be found on: http://wwww.silversource.com/

Bapnasilver.com has copied the text of our home page, and included this stolen text on its own website in an attempt to outrank SilverSource on Google search results. Bapna's copying is so blatant that it has failed to delete occurences of the SilverSource trademark from that text. It has also submitted same as a press release and company profile at prweb.com and alibaba.com. Owner/administrator contact information for Bapna, PRWeb and AliBaba follows on page 2 of this letter.

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted material described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

We would greatly appreciate your early attention to this matter. Please consider me personally at your service for any further assistance or information you may require.


Yours Sincerely,
[Private]
SilverSource.com
eM [Private]
[Private]
Santa Monica, CA 90403-5784 USA 
Tel [Private]

Bapna International Co., Ltd.
[Private]
Banglumpoo, Klongsan, Bangkok - 10 600.
